name: Recursive Pain
description: Recursive pain is a fast-paced third person multiplayer shooter that brings many original ideas and gameplay mechanics to the online-shooters genre.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64 bits only) Processor: 4 Cores Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB VRAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 (64 bits only) Processor: intel i5-3570 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB, GeForce GTX 670 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
